}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "WMCAC02" (under the shield) and "8WMCAC02.1A1G" (on the back) :is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
{{SCollapse | Per the FCC 'manual' (datasheet)... | <syntaxhighlight lang="text" style="border: solid thin gray; font-size:90%;" line> *'''Transmitter Output Power (802.11a)''' **802.11a (5150 to 5250MHz): 15.70 dBm **802.11a (5725 to 5850MHz): 25.26 dBm *'''Receiver Sensitivity (802.11a)''' (Error rate = 10% at room temperature) **-82 dBm @ 6Mbps **-81 dBm @ 9Mbps **-79 dBm @ 12Mbps **-77 dBm @ 18Mbps **-74 dBm @ 24Mbps **-70 dBm @ 36Mbps **-66 dBm @ 48Mbps **-65 dBm @ 54Mbps *'''Transmitter Output Power (802.11n)''' **5150 to 5250MHz ***802.11n MCS0 20MHz: 16.06 dBm ***802.11n MCS0 40MHz: MCS2/10/18 ***-71 dBm @ MCS3/11/19 ***-67 dBm @ MCS4/12/20 ***-63 dBm @ MCS5/13/21 ***-62 dBm @ MCS6/14/22 ***-61 dBm @ MCS7/13/23 *'''Transmitter Output Power (802.11ac)''' **5150 to 5250MHz
